mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commissioned by Pearl McCallum McManus; completed 1925 with 24 rooms. Purchased by Hobart and Isabel Garlick, 1927, sold 1944 to Dewey Metzdorf (Westin Hotels). Expanded 1964. Original structures, except for one building and the tower, demolished 1960s and 1990s. — https://www.desertsun.com/story/life/2022/01/30/palm-springs-history-oasis-hotel-glorious-garden-paradise/9254944002/ [work]
